data.name: Trigger Spree
data.detailed_description:
Trigger Spree is an unrealistic multiplayer FPS with a focus on fun + variety + speed.
The vast selection of weapons and maps allow virtually endless possiblities and unique scenarios

FEATURES:


  • Over 30 cool weapons ranging from experimental / conventional / alien / futuristic / weird
  • Radical environments across many settings and genres
  • Aesthetic Vaporish Artstyle
  • Cast of characters includes human-sized-squirrel, robots, aliens, and a Mecha riding cat
  • Tons of match customization: Change weapon spawns, gravity, player speed, toggle jetpacks, bunnyhopping, and more!
  • Maps full of hidden nooks, paths for platforming, and meta minigame possbilities

MAPS:

  • Mall: Medium-sized shopping mall with different shops, escalators, palm trees, bathroom, maintenance hallways, and foodcourt
  • Resort: Beachfront hotel with canals and sunshine, take a ride on the tour boats! Or hide out in a hotel room
  • Cemetery: A place of worship and death. Get around the map using the main chapel, underground tunnels, and hedge-maze.
  • Area 57: Secret facility located in the arctic mountains. There are rumors of alien research going on here...
  • Avenue: Large City map set between a bank, night club, and parking garage. Features underground subway with speeding train
  • Laboratory: Blue Labs is in the middle of the desert surrounded by satellite dishes.
  • +Many More

WEAPONS:

Here are some of the cool weapons you can use. there are over 30


  • Refiner: Your trusty, (default) starting weapon. A strong accurate revolver gives you a fighting chance against almost any other weapon.
  • Nade-balla: Fire a bouncy explosive Nade-ball that can roll around and be remotely detonated.
  • Blazer: A Flamethrower, keep your enemies close and burn them to toast!
  • Rocketrix: A special rocket launcher where you can toggle the speed of the rocket in mid air.
  • PP77: Compact, prototype sub-machine gun. Incredibly rapid, but also very inaccurate.
  • NRG Streamer: An experimental weapon of unknown origin, Shoots a precise constant stream of energy.
  • Acid Nozzle: A high-powered "water-gun" that shoots acid instead of water.
  • Laser Pistol: Bounce lasers off the wall with this alien weapon, great for shooting around corners & trapping enemies.
  • G.T.A.R.: Guitar Type Audio Rifle. Shatter your opponents with heavy metal guitar riffs that can block hallways and explode after a few seconds
  • Firework Launcher: Shoots a live firework that will explode in 1 second or if it hits somebody. Dont get distracted by it's beautiful explosion.
  • Suicide Squirrel: Remote-controlled, mecha-squirrel. Guide it to the enemy then detonate. Be careful, youll be vulnerable when using it.
  • + Many more!

GAMEPLAY MECHANICS & SPECIFICS:

  • Straightforward run & gun gameplay
  • Use any weapons you pick up from the map or dead enemies
  • Weapons are spawned on maps, each spawn slot can be changed or randomized
  • Quick player speed (no need for a sprint button/mechanic)
  • No regenerating health (in default modes)
  • Static crosshair (no aim down sights except scoped weapons)
  • Jetpack with directional head-tilt-based boosting (default off) (optional)

DISCLAIMERS

  • All information, details, features on this page are subject to change

Thanks for checking out Trigger Spree! Please consider checking out my other games below:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/340340/Domestic_Dog/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/776790/Squirrel_Sphere/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/334690/Squirreltopia/

data.short_description: Unrealistic Multiplayer FPS with a focus on variety, speed and putting the FUN back in F.P.S.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 7 (or higher) 64 Bit
  • Processor: AMD FX-4350, 4.2 GHz / Intel Core i5-3450, 3.10 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 6870, 1 GB / GeForce GTX 650 Ti, 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 (or higher) 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770, 3.40 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Core i7-3770, 3.40 GHz
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset

Minimum:

mac_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes:
Game has light violence (blood FX and ragdoll)
References to alcohol and/or Drugs
Lewd Humor
